titles.title: I Know The Lord Has Made A Way For Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know the Lord has made a way for me. (2x)
So, I'll live for Him each day in the things I do,
And say I know the Lord has made a way for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know the Lord has made a way for me. (2x)
As I live a holy life, shun the wrong and do the right,
I know the Lord has made a way for me.
